statements: DELETE FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'High Security';
DELETE FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'Restricted Access'
DELETE FROM security_controls WHERE control_type = 'Access Control';
DELETE FROM security_controls WHERE control_name = 'Firewall Rule';
DELETE FROM security_controls WHERE control_name = 'Access Control' AND policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'Data Protection');
DELETE FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_name = 'Access Control';
DELETE FROM procedures WHERE procedure_name = 'Change Password';
